heading: HR01585
0: A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST TERM THE ILLEGAL LOGGING ACTIVITIES IN THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE RESULTING TO THE HEAVY TOLL OF LIVES AND SEVERE DAMAGE TO FARMS AND PROPERTIES CAUSED BY THE RECENT TYPHOONS URDUJA AND VINTA'S ONSLAUGHT, AND LIKEWISE, WE, THE PEOPLE OF THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE CONVEYS OUR UTMOST GRATITUDE TO OUR BELOVED PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE IN LOOKING INTO THE MATTER WITH A HIGHEST CONCERN TO ORDER A HALT TO LOGGING OPERATIONS IN THE PROVINCE DUE TO MASSIVE FOREST DENUDATION IN THE AREA
status: Pending with the Committee on NATURAL RESOURCES since 2018-01-22
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01585
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST TERM THE ILLEGAL LOGGING ACTIVITIES IN THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE RESULTING TO THE HEAVY TOLL OF LIVES AND SEVERE DAMAGE TO FARMS AND PROPERTIES CAUSED BY THE RECENT TYPHOONS URDUJA AND VINTA'S ONSLAUGHT, AND LIKEWISE, WE, THE PEOPLE OF THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE CONVEYS OUR UTMOST GRATITUDE TO OUR BELOVED PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE IN LOOKING INTO THE MATTER WITH A HIGHEST CONCERN TO ORDER A HALT TO LOGGING OPERATIONS IN THE PROVINCE DUE TO MASSIVE FOREST DENUDATION IN THE AREA
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : JALOSJOS, SETH FREDERICK P.
DATE FILED : 2018-01-15
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATURAL RESOURCES ON 2018-01-22
